Test Name: FLT3 Internal Tandem Duplication (ITD) and D835 Gene Mutation Analysis
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate or peripheral blood
Purpose: To detect FLT3 ITD and D835 mutations for diagnostic, prognostic, and therapeutic decision making in hematologic malignancies.
Equipment: PCR instrument (e.g., Applied Biosystems 7500 Real-Time PCR System)
